heading: Deep remove falsy
title: Remove all falsy values from an object and its nested children
summary: Recursively removes all falsy values (null, undefined, 0, false) from an object and its nested properties.

structuredData.headline: Remove all falsy values from an object and its nested children
structuredData.description: Recursively removes all falsy values (null, undefined, 0, false) from an object and its nested properties.
